LIGHTNING

How to take advantage of hexagonal architecture for Badoom extraction?

3:20 PM

About

With the Badoom sunset, migration of big scope can be a nightmare. Any little feature can quickly require to extract a big block at the same time, and we donâ€™t want to stop developing new features. We will share with you how we used the hexagonal architecture of our service to allow an iterative and risk-free extraction.

Speakers

Julian LE CALVEZ

I've been at Back Market for 2,5 years as a Backend Engineer in the Mojo tribe. I started in the Finance squad and i'm now working in the Order Management squad. Before I worked for 13 years in agencies and consulting companies, and for the few recent years in startups.

Otherwise, i have a passion for escape game, as you can see here: https://www.the-escapers.com/profil/julian-le-calvez and rhum (I don't have a profile yet). But mostly I enjoy spending time with friends, cook, or just chill in from of the TV.

Baptiste SAVES

At Back Market since 1 year and a half. I worked with finance tools squad on tools and tax topics.

I am now part of the Order management squad and working on new projects Bouygues and Monthly insurance. Of course our biggest challenge to come will be the OMS sunset.

Before that, I have worked in IoT for Renault and EDF and on finance building a KYC and ledger application.
